Package ev3

package ev3
EV3 robot control and integration package. This package provides comprehensive functionality for controlling and managing LEGO Mindstorms EV3 robots using LeJOS (Java). It implements an intelligent exploration, mapping, and object collection algorithm designed for autonomous robotic behavior.

Architecture Overview:

  • Core Classes: Provide fundamental robot operations including position tracking, sensing (sensor data acquisition and interpretation), and movement control (motor management and navigation).
  • Navigation Algorithm Classes (NavAlgo): Implement higher-level navigation and task planning algorithms that utilize core functionality to accomplish complex navigation objectives.
  • Automate Class: Serves as the orchestration and control layer, managing the overall robot logic and behavior at the highest level. Implements automata theory principles to define and control state transitions and complex behavioral sequences.

This hierarchical design enables sophisticated autonomous behavior through layered abstractions, from low-level sensor and motor control to high-level task orchestration and state management.

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Position
    Represents the position and orientation state of the EV3 robot on the field.
